summary: Add a unique follower inspired by Barbarian available for Custom HDT CBBE Only.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][size=3][size=6]Troya the Lionhearth[/size][/size][size=3]
[/size]
Add a unique follower inspired by Barbarian
available for Custom HDT CBBE Only.[size=3]
[/size][/size]
[size=3]Name: Troya the Lionhearth
Race: Imperial
Body: Custom CBBE
Body Height: 1.0500
Voiced: Female Commander

Essensial: False
Marrigable: True
Morality: Any Crime

Class: Vampire
Stats: Levels 20 - 120
Extra: 1000 Health, Magika, Stamina
Combat Style: Melee Only

Outfit: Naked Armor Outfit (Playable)
Inventory: -None-
Stats: Daedric Armor
Craftable: False
Upgradeable: [size=3]False[/size]

Weapon: Dwarven Greatsword
Stats: Vanilla
Craftable: [size=3]True[/size]
Playable: True
Upgradeable: True

[/b][/b][size=3][size=3][size=3][size=3][size=3]Riverwood
Sleeping Giants Inn[/size][/size][/size][/size][/size]
